TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Behavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示由 管理的 物件。

span.span: Represents the objects that are managed by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別可以擴充來開發任何類型的使用者介面行為，包括選取、 拖曳並調整大小行為。This class can be extended to develop any type of user interface behavior, including selection, drag, and resize behaviors. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[行為服務概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f). > [!NOTE] > 您類型必須與相關聯型別。Your type must be associated with a type. 不支援獨立圖像 （glyph） 的行為。Glyph-independent behaviors are not supported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立您自己的類別為基礎回應使用者所按的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create your own class based on the class that responds to user clicks. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 ，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父行為是由維護行為堆疊上的下一步 行為。The parent behavior is the next behavior on the behavior stack maintained by the . 如果`callParentBehavior`參數是`true`，然後在`behaviorService`參數不得為`null`。If the `callParentBehavior` parameter is `true`, then the `behaviorService` parameter must not be `null`. `callParentBehavior` 指出是否基底類別應該呼叫父行為，然後再允許選取正確的父行為。`callParentBehavior` indicates whether the base class should call the parent behavior, and then allow the select the correct parent behavior.

span.span: is , and is .

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否應該停用 物件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether objects should be disabled.

value.span: 如果要將所有設計工具所收到的物件應該有狀態設為Enabled = false時這作用中; 否則。

span.span: if all objects the designer receives should have states set to Enabled = false when this is active; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`true`值屬性會指出要，所有設計工具所收到的物件應該有這個行為已作用時，停用其狀態。A `true` value for the property indicates to the that all objects the designer receives should have their state disabled when this behavior is active. 屬性可搭配方法，使您可以自訂圖像 （glyph） 與行為之間的互動。The property works in conjunction with the method so you can customize the interaction between glyphs and behaviors. 下表摘要說明的呼叫結果特定。The following table summarizes the results of a call to for a particular . || 是 `true` is `true`| 是 `false` is `false`| |-|-|-| |點擊測試的圖像已指派的行為。Hit-tested glyph has an assigned behavior|如果具有指定`command ID`位於、 該會停用，並傳回。If the with the specified `command ID` is found in the , that is disabled and returned. 否則，傳回 `null`。Otherwise, `null` is returned.| 呼叫的行為，如果找到，則此行為的傳回。 is called on the behavior and, if found, the behavior’s is returned. 否則，結果具有指定`command ID`傳回。Otherwise, the result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.| |點擊測試的圖像沒有任何指派的行為Hit-tested glyph has no assigned behavior|結果具有指定`command ID`傳回。The result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.|結果具有指定`command ID`傳回。The result of with the specified `command ID` is returned.|

summary.span: 裝飾項視窗在其遺失滑鼠捕捉 (Mouse Capture) 時呼叫。

span.span: Called by the adorner window when it loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行為可以要求透過行為服務滑鼠捕捉本身推入行為堆疊方法。A behavior can request mouse capture through the behavior service by pushing itself onto the behavior stack with the method. 如果這樣做，它會通知您透過方法擷取遺失時。If it does so, it will be notified through the method when capture is lost. 通常行為本身從堆疊中移除這一次。Generally the behavior removes itself from the stack at this time. 下列動作之一發生時，擷取已遺失：Capture is lost when one of the following actions occurs: - 其他人要求擷取。Someone else requests capture. - 推入另一個的行為。Another behavior is pushed. - 已移除這項行為。This behavior is removed. 在這些情況下，每個將呼叫的行為。In each of these cases, will be called on the behavior.

span.span: A .
A value indicating which button was clicked.

param.name: mouseLoc
param.span: 發生按一下動作的位置。

summary.span: 在任何按兩下滑鼠 (Double-Click) 訊息進入 的裝飾項視窗時進行呼叫。

span.span: Called when any double-click message enters the adorner window of the .

returns.span: 如果已處理訊息，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the message was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法時，任何按兩下訊息進入`WndProc`裝飾項視窗的。The method is called when any double-click message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 訊息第一次，傳遞至最上層行為堆疊中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. 傳回`true`從這個方法表示訊息由處理不應該繼續進行處理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 從這裡，訊息會傳送至適當的行為。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理按兩下訊息。The following code example demonstrates how to handle a double-click message. 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱[如何： 擴充的外觀和行為的控制項在設計模式中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs/CS/DesignerDemoControl.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.MarginBorderAnchorGlyphs/VB/DesignerDemoControl.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法時，任何滑鼠向下訊息進入`WndProc`裝飾項視窗的。The method is called when any mouse-down message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 訊息第一次，傳遞至最上層行為堆疊中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. 傳回`true`從這個方法表示訊息由處理不應該繼續進行處理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 從這裡，訊息會傳送至適當的行為。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.

span.span: A .
A value indicating which button was clicked.
The location at which the move occurred.

summary.span: 會在任何滑鼠移動 (Mouse-Move) 訊息進入 的裝飾項視窗時進行呼叫。

span.span: Called when any mouse-move message enters the adorner window of the .

returns.span: 如果已處理訊息，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the message was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法時，任何滑鼠移動訊息進入`WndProc`裝飾項視窗的。The method is called when any mouse-move message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 訊息第一次，傳遞至最上層行為堆疊中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. 傳回`true`從這個方法表示訊息由處理不應該繼續進行處理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 從這裡，訊息會傳送至適當的行為。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法時，任何滑鼠向上訊息進入`WndProc`裝飾項視窗的。The method is called when any mouse-up message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the . 訊息第一次，傳遞至最上層行為堆疊中。The message is first passed here, to the top-most in the behavior stack. 傳回`true`從這個方法表示訊息由處理不應該繼續進行處理。Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the and should not continue to be processed. 從這裡，訊息會傳送至適當的行為。From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
